message: Sass has nested @media since 3.1, I'm eager to see how people are using it to build RWD
This is something I'd absolutely love to write.
If we could allow variables and root level @extend in the @media queries, we more easily package up @media queries for flexibility and compass plugins
@imathis what do you mean by "root level extend"?
I really wish that sass would gather up all of the @media selectors into one group in the final CSS. I hate having all of the extra selector cruft making my file needlessly large
Love the nested @media queries in theory though
@dangayle this changes the cascade and can cause styling irregularities
I've thought about that. Somehow having it optional would make me happy.
@dangayle We'd need to find reasonable heuristics that would allow us to with a high-degree of certainty avoid cascade issues.
